displayName.japanese: 全てのトロフィー獲得

description.english: Earn all trophies.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i trofei.
description.french: Remportez tous les trophées.
description.german: Erlange alle Trophäen.
description.spanish: Gana todos los trofeos.
description.arabic: ‏احصل على جميع الجوائز.
description.japanese: 全てのトロフィーを獲得する｡

description.english: Win a match against Jericho. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Vinci un match contro Jericho. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Remportez un match contre Jericho. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Gewinne ein Match gegen Jericho. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Gana un combate contra Jericho. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏فز في مباراة ضد Jericho. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Jerichoとの試合に勝利する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Throw an opponent out of the ring using Grapple Carry. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Trasporta e lancia fuori dal ring un avversario durante una presa. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Jetez un adversaire hors du ring après un soulevé. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Wirf einen Gegner mit Griff und Tragen aus dem Ring. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Carga a tu rival y lánzalo fuera del ring. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏القِ بخصم خارج الحلبة باستخدام Grapple Carry. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Grapple Carryを使って、敵をリング外に投げ捨てる(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Make an opponent fall off the Trailer in the Parking Lot. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Fai cadere un avversario dall'autoarticolato nel parcheggio. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Faites tomber un adversaire du camion garé sur le parking. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass ein Gegner in der Garage vom Sattelzug fällt. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Haz que un rival caiga desde el tráiler del aparcamiento. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏اجعل خصم يسقط من المقطورة الصغيرة في موقف السيارات. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 駐車場のトレーラーの上から敵を転落させる(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Win a match as Sasha Banks. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Vinci un match con Sasha Banks. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Remportez un match avec Sasha Banks. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Gewinne ein Match als Sasha Banks. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Gana un combate como Sasha Banks. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏فز في مباراة باللعب كـSasha Banks. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Sasha Banksを使って試合に勝利する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Use all 4 carry positions in a single match. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Usa tutte e 4 le posizioni di trasporto nello stesso match. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Utilisez les 4 positions de soulèvement dans un seul match. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Benutze alle 4 Tragepositionen während eines einzigen Matchs. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Usa las 4 posiciones de carga en un mismo combate. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم أوضاع الحمل الأربعة كلها في مباراة واحدة. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 1回の試合で4つのキャリーポジション全てを使用する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Slam your opponent onto the steel steps. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Scaraventa un avversario contro i gradini d'acciaio. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Fracassez votre adversaire sur les marches en acier. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Ramme deinen Gegner gegen die Stahltreppe. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Estampa a tu rival contra los escalones metálicos. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم برمي خصمك على الدرج الحديدي. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 相手を鉄階段に叩き付ける(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Finish a match backstage. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Termina un match nel backstage. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Terminez un match dans les coulisses. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Beende ein Match backstage. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Termina un combate en el backstage. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏أنهِ المباراة في الكواليس. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: バックステージで試合を完了させる(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Attack your opponent using the Championship Title. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Attacca il tuo avversario usando la cintura di campione. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Attaquez votre adversaire avec la ceinture de Champion. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Greif deinen Gegner mit dem Championship-Titel an. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Ataca a tu rival usando el título. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏هاجم خصمك باستخدام لقب البطولة. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: ベルトを使って相手をなぐる(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Perform 3 major reversals in a Single Match. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Esegui 3 contrattacchi maggiori nello stesso match. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Réussissez 3 contres majeurs dans le même match. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Führe 3 schwere Reversals in einem einzigen Match aus. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Ejecuta 3 inversiones mayores en un mismo combate. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏نفذ 3 حركات عكس كبرى في مباراة فردية. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 1試合の間にメジャーリバーサルを3回行う(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Perform a Crowd or Opponent taunt. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Esegui un insulto folla o avversario. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Provoquez le public ou l'adversaire. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Verspotte die Zuschauer oder deinen Gegner. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Ejecuta una burla al público o al rival. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم باستهزاء الحشد أو الخصم. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 観客または対戦相手Tauntを行う(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Successfully pin a distracted opponent using a Leverage Pin. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Completa uno schienamento speciale contro un avversario distratto. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Réussissez un Tombé spécial sur un adversaire distrait. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Pinne einen abgelenkten Gegner erfolgreich mit einem Leverage Pin. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Realiza con éxito una Inversión con pin a un rival distraído. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم بتثبيت خصم مشتت بنجاح مستخدمًا مهارة التثبيت القوي. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 気を逸らした対戦相手をLeverage Pinでピンする(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Win a Normal One on One match in less than 60 seconds (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Vinci un match normale 1 vs 1 in meno di 60 secondi. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Remportez un match normal en 1 contre 1 en moins de 60 secondes. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Gewinne ein normales 1 vs. 1 Match in unter 60 Sekunden. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Gana un combate normal 1 VS. 1 en menos de 60 segundos. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏اربح مباراة لاعب ضد لاعب عادية في أقل من 60 ثانية (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 60秒未満でNormal One on One試合に勝利する(PLAYモードでA.I.と対戦)

description.english: Escape an elimination attempt by 2 Superstars. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Sfuggi a un tentativo di eliminazione da parte di 2 Superstar. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Échappez à une tentative d'élimination par 2 Superstars. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Entkomme aus einem Elimination-Versuch durch 2 Superstars. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Escapa de un intento de eliminación llevado a cabo por 2 Superstars. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: قم بالهروب من محاولة ‏الإقصاء من 2 من الـSuperstars (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 2人のスーパースターによる排除の試みから逃れる

description.english: Receive 3 rollout buffs during a Royal Rumble match. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Ottieni 3 bonus da rotolamento in un match Royal Rumble. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Recevez 3 boosts liés à une roulade hors du ring au Royal Rumble. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Erhalte 3 Rollout-Verbesserungen in einem Royal Rumble Match. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Recibe 3 potenciadores de rodar durante un combate Royal Rumble. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏احصل على 3 دفعات خروج خلال مباراة Royal Rumble (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Royal Rumble試合中に3つのロールアウトのバフをもらう(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Slow your opponent by throwing something from the catering table. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Rallenta l'avversario lanciandogli oggetti dal tavolo del catering. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Ralentissez votre adversaire en lui envoyant un mets du buffet. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Verlangsame deinen Gegner, indem du ihn vom Catering-Tisch bewirfst. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Ralentiza a tu rival lanzando algo de la mesa de catering. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏أبطئ خصمك عن طريق إلقاء غرض من طاولة الطعام. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: ケータリングテーブルにある何かを投げつけて対戦相手の速度を落とす(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Perform a successful diving attack from the forklift. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Metti a segno un attacco in tuffo dal muletto. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Réalisez une attaque plongeante depuis le chariot élévateur. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Führe einen erfolgreichen Sprungangriff vom Gabelstapler aus. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Realiza con éxito un ataque en plancha desde el montacargas. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم بتنفيذ هجمة انقضاض من أعلى الرافعة. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: フォークリフトからダイビング攻撃の発動に成功する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

displayName.english: Hope you have insurance for that
displayName.arabic: ‏أتمنى أن يكون لديك تأمين على ذلك
displayName.japanese: Hope you have insurance for that

description.english: Perform a Car OMG! (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Esegui un momento OMG! macchina. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Effectuez un moment OMG ! sur une voiture. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Führe einen Wagen-OMG! aus. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Ejecuta un OMG! de coche. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم بتنفيذ !OMG من سيارة! (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Car OMG!を発動する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Successfully knock your opponent off their feet using an Equipment Box. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Butta a terra il tuo avversario usando una cassa di strumenti. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Renversez votre adversaire à l'aide d'une caisse d'équipement. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Bring einen Gegner mit einer Ausrüstungskiste zu Fall. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Derriba con éxito a tu rival usando una Caja de equipo. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: أطِح بخصمك من فوق الأرض بنجاح باستخدام ‏صندوق المعدات. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: 機材箱を使って相手を立てなくする(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Perform a Hot Tag. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Esegui un Hot tag. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Effectuez un Hot Tag. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Führe einen Hot Tag aus. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Ejecuta un Hot Tag. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم بتنفيذ Hot Tag. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Hot Tagを発動する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.english: Catch and carry a diving opponent. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.italian: Prendi al volo un avversario in tuffo e trasportalo. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Attrapez et portez un adversaire après son plongeon. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Fange und trage einen springenden Gegner. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Atrapa y carga a un rival cuando realice una plancha. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏امسك واحمل خصمًا يقوم بالانقضاض. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: ダイブする対戦相手を捕まえて持ち運ぶ(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

description.italian: Elimina tutti gli avversari in un match Elimination Chamber. (Modalità Esibizione contro IA)
description.french: Éliminez tous les adversaires dans un match en Elimination Chamber. (Mode EXHIBITION contre l'I.A.)
description.german: Eliminiere alle Gegner in einem Elimination Chamber Match. (Gegen KI im EXHIBITION-Modus)
description.spanish: Elimina a todos los rivales en un combate Elimination Chamber. (Modo Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏تخلّص من كل الخصوم في مباراة Elimination Chamber (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.japanese: Elimination Chamber試合で対戦相手全員を排除する(PLAYモードでAIと対戦)

displayName.japanese: ロード・トゥ・レッスルマニア

description.english: WWE Universe - Win the Royal Rumble and get a World title at WrestleMania.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Vinci la Royal Rumble e ottieni un titolo mondiale a WrestleMania.
description.french: Univers WWE - Remportez le Royal Rumble et remportez un titre majeur à WrestleMania.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Gewinne den Royal Rumble und sichere dir einen World Title bei WrestleMania.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Gana el Royal Rumble y consigue el título mundial en WrestleMania.
description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - اربح الـRoyal Rumble واحصل على لقب بطولة العالم في WrestleMania.
description.japanese: WWE UNIVERSEでRoyal Rumbleに勝利しWRESTLEMANIAでWorld王座を勝ち取る

description.english: WWE Universe - Cash in Money in the Bank at WrestleMania and win the Championship.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Vinci il titolo incassando il Money in the Bank a WrestleMania.
description.french: Univers WWE - Utilisez la mallette Money in the Bank à WrestleMania et remportez le titre.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Löse den Money in the Bank-Koffer bei WrestleMania ein und gewinne die Championship.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Canjea el maletín de Money in the Bank en WrestleMania y gana el título.
description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - استخدم Money in the Bank في WrestleMania واربح البطولة.
description.japanese: WWE UNIVERSEのWrestleManiaでMoney In The Bankの権利を行使し王座を獲得する

description.english: WWE Universe - Win or defend the WWE Raw Women's Championship at WrestleMania.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Vinci o difendi il WWE Raw Women's Championship a WrestleMania.
description.french: Univers WWE - Remportez le WWE Raw Women's Championship (ou défendez votre titre) à WrestleMania.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Gewinne oder verteidige die WWE Raw Women's Championship bei WrestleMania.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Gana o defiende el WWE Raw Women's Championship en WrestleMania.
description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - اربح أو دافع عن WWE Raw Women's Championship في WrestleMania.
description.japanese: WWE UniverseのWrestleManiaでWWE Women's Championshipを獲得あるいは防衛する

description.english: WWE Universe - Play and complete each match on a show's match-card.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Gioca e completa ogni match nel programma di uno show.
description.french: Univers WWE - Jouez et terminez tous les matchs de la carte d'un show.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Spiele und schließe alle Matches der Match-Card einer Show ab.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Juega y completa todos los combates de un show.
description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - العب وأكمل كل مباراة على بطاقة المباراة التابعة للعرض.
description.japanese: WWE UNIVERSEで番組のMatch-cardの各試合をプレイし完了する

description.english: WWE Universe - Play and win 50 matches.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Gioca e vinci 50 match.

description.english: Win a match as Karl Anderson. (PLAY mode against A.I.)

description.arabic: ‏اربح مباراة كـKarl Anderson. (وضع اللعب ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي.)
description.japanese: WWE Universe - Naturally trigger 15 Rivalries. (Simulation doesn't count, PLAY mode against A.I.)

description.english: Win a match as Daniel Bryan. (PLAY mode against A.I.)

description.english: WWE Universe - Play as Roman Reigns, beat Undertaker at WrestleMania.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - العب كـRoman Reigns، اهزم Undertaker في WrestleMania.
description.japanese: WWE Universe – WrestleManiaでRoman ReignsとしてプレイしUndertakerに勝つ

description.english: Use a custom Championship and win a match. (Single play)

description.arabic: ‏استخدم بطولة مخصصة واربح مباراة. (اللعب الفردي)
description.japanese: オリジナルのベルトを作成し、そのベルトを使って試合に勝利する(シングルプレイ)
